Filters the duration after which an order should be automatically marked as received.
doc.long_description: This filter allows developers to modify the default time period after which an order is automatically considered as received by the customer. This is particularly useful for adjusting the auto-receive functionality based on specific business rules or logistics considerations.
doc.long_description_html: This filter allows developers to modify the default time period after which an order is automatically considered as received by the customer. This is particularly useful for adjusting the auto-receive functionality based on specific business rules or logistics considerations.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The default duration to wait before marking the order as received. Defaults to '+7 days'. The duration should be a valid strtotime string.

tags.name: param
tags.content: An array containing contextual information where: - [0] \WC_Order $order The WooCommerce order object. - [1] int $shipment_id The shipment ID related to the order.

doc.description: Filters to validate order shipment items before creating a shipment.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Indicates whether there are invalid items in the shipment. Default is false.
